text: The Now and Then Show was a television show based in Mendocino, California which ran from 1985–87 and still appears in reruns. It was a mix of talk show and sketch comedy hosted by Odd Bob Avery. Notable guests included the band Tommy Tutone, artist Larry Fuentes, and musician Joel Scott Hill. ==External links== * The Now and Then Show on YouTube Category:1980s American comedy television series Category:Mendocino County, California
